# kimisc

A collection of useful functions not found anywhere else.

## Installation

You can install the development version of kimisc from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("krlmlr/kimisc")
```

# Package index

## Supported functions

Helper functions for which I donâ€™t know other implementations

- [`cut_format()`](http://krlmlr.github.io/kimisc/reference/cut_format.md)
  : Convert Numeric to Factor, with custom formatting
- [`export.list()`](http://krlmlr.github.io/kimisc/reference/export.list.md)
  : Exports to an environment
- [`export()`](http://krlmlr.github.io/kimisc/reference/export.md) :
  Exports to an environment
- [`gdiff()`](http://krlmlr.github.io/kimisc/reference/gdiff.md) :
  Generalized lagged differences
- [`in.interval.lo()`](http://krlmlr.github.io/kimisc/reference/in.interval.lo.md)
  : Checks if values are contained in an interval (open on the left)
- [`in.interval.ro()`](http://krlmlr.github.io/kimisc/reference/in.interval.ro.md)
  : Checks if values are contained in an interval (open on the right)
- [`nin.interval.lo()`](http://krlmlr.github.io/kimisc/reference/nin.interval.lo.md)
  : Checks if values are outside of an interval (open on the left)
- [`nin.interval.ro()`](http://krlmlr.github.io/kimisc/reference/nin.interval.ro.md)
  : Checks if values are outside of an interval (open on the right)

## Deprecated functions

- [`kimisc-deprecated`](http://krlmlr.github.io/kimisc/reference/kimisc-deprecated.md)
  : Deprecated functions
